lines.text: You beat Luis Armijo by two votes.
That's because Domingo and Gusdorf were out of town.
So, you would have won by four.
Hell no man, those guys vote six, seven times apiece.
I'll hit you so hard they'll arrest you in El Paso for speeding.
Hey, what are you doing? You can't buy bullets with foodstamps grandpa.
Probably been in the family for generations I bet.
No, I found it on the highway this morning
What good is a hometown if everyone you know is gone?
Why is it every time we're mad at one of them, we end up hurting one of us?
Does the name Custer ring a bell?
Nobody would do anything if they knew what they were in for.
I don't do things. I give advice.
